verbs.description: atletico rebounds from dortmund debacle to [V: take] [ARG1: liga lead] atletico madrid bounced back from its worst defeat under coach diego simeone by beating real sociedad 2 - 0 to take the lead of the spanish league on saturday atletico was one point ahead of barcelona and espanyol barcelona can reclaim the lead on sunday when it hosts real madrid in the season first clasico atletico produced the convincing home victory over sociedad three days after it lost at borussia dortmund 4 - 0 in the champions league its biggest loss in 390 matches since simeone took charge in 2011 camp nou rodrigo hernandez madrid barcelona santiago arias marcelino garcia rodrigo moreno 2017 - 18 anaitz arbilla athletic bilbao dortmund juanfran torres atletico madrid valencia vigo espanyol eduardo berizzo diego godin thomas partey champions league borussia dortmund iago aspas aritz aduriz thomas lemar cristhian stuani eibar angel correa spain filipe luís kasmirski brais mendez stefan savic filipe luis leganes bilbao portugues cristian portu atletico asier riesgo diego simeone rayo vallecano
